message: I'm offering you a unique opportunity to purchase a product for $100. I'm confident that it's a great value, but I want to assure you that there's no pressure to buy. You can take your time to consider the offer.
I appreciate the offer, but I'd like to observe a few rounds before making a purchase to understand the distribution of high and low-quality products.

It's a good opportunity to get a feel for the process, and I'm confident that the next product will be more appealing to you.
